name: IN-VERT
description: This is a short hardcore enthralling puzzle-platform game about a lonely robot, which tries to find his master. To go all the way you'll have to look for the master in two dimensions at the same time. Parallel world module will help to overcome any obstacles!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Процессор: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 128MB or higher DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 50 MB
